args:
Is this article primarily about a new action or announcement by the Trump administration/White House/Executive? Respond simply with "yes" or "no" .
President Donald Trump, speaking at the White House ceremony for his executive order banning trans athletes...
President Donald Trump, speaking at the White House ceremony for his executive order banning trans athletes from competing on women’s and girls’ sports, said “the actions we’re taking today are the latest in a sweeping effort to reclaim our culture and our laws from the radical left crusade against biological reality.”
“We’re defending the rights and safety and pride of the American people, including our great, great, great female athletes,” he said.
